attributes.action: Queen's Jubilee Medal - not the British Empire Medal
attributes.additional_details: To celebrate The Queen's Diamond Jubilee and as an antidote to the notion that the country would welcome the resurrection of the British Empire Medal, we request that the Governement petition Her Majesty to create a new honour. It could be called the Jubilee Medal and would also recognise Her Majesty's unstinting  service, both in times of war and peace, to the country and the Commonwealth.
